heroDescription: System administration specialist with full-stack development skills, creating efficient IT solutions and intuitive web applications
aboutText1: IT Administrator experienced in managing networks and systems (AD, Proxmox), enhancing security, automating tasks (PowerShell), and building web applications. Currently pursuing a Master's degree in Computer Science at Politechnika Warszawska.
aboutText2: Passionate about creating efficient IT solutions and intuitive web applications. Specialized in system administration, virtualization, and full-stack development with a focus on practical, user-centered solutions.
IT Dashboard description: Admin dashboard with Google and ADFS login displaying users and statuses from multiple sources (AD, Google, Slack, Miro) for centralized management
TableMate description: Unified platform for company resource management (desks, rooms, parking) and ordering services
Gramatyk description: Web app fetching Polish word declensions from external source via serverless proxy API
ScholarHub description: University platform supporting recruitment, online meetings, chat, and grading system
IT Administrator at Reikon Games descrip: Administer server infrastructure (Windows/Linux, Proxmox VE), automate tasks with PowerShell, manage endpoint lifecycle, develop internal monitoring dashboards, administer SaaS platforms
IT Support and Project Coordinator descr: Delivered IT support services, managed Microsoft 365 and Google services, organized international events with technical support for 500+ attendees
CEX Team Analyst at Orange Poland descri: Conducted competitor analysis resulting in 15% market share increase, tested mobile applications uncovering 100+ bugs, developed employee gamification strategy
